author: Krisztian Sandor, Tom Carreras
title: Bitcoin Bounces to $106K After Iran-Israel Jitters, but Analysts Warn of Deeper Pullback
description: Circle is up 13% on news that Amazon and Walmart are moving into stablecoins.
content:
The crypto market is slightly bouncing back from early Fridays jitters on escalating conflict between Israel and Iran.
After slumping to the $102,600 mark, bitcoin 
 rebounded to around $106,000 be… [+2376 chars]
